page.title: 14OLD AND YOUNG ...
page.content: It must be said that there exists a small ammount of distrust between the older and younger members of the Gwaelod-y-Garth community. The pensioners feel that the young people who have moved into the area are slightly standoffish because of the way they take very little interest in community life. The pensioners are also slightly bitter that homes they once bought for around #300 are now changing hands for as much as #50000. The feeling is that these people care more about property values than they do about community life. If the basic fabric of the buildings is in danger or some new development is planned then they will join together in protest. Most of the time however, the older residents are very much on their own.
